items.sentence: I told Tom I didn\'t want to hear about his problems.
I told Tom that I didn\'t want to ever see him again.
Tom and Mary have dinner together almost every night.
Tom and Mary have finally moved into their new house.
Where to go and what to see were my primary concerns.
Why are Tom and I always the ones who have to suffer?
Why did you think you could do this without any help?
If you ever feel like doing that, go ahead and do it.
Tom has a small antique shop right next to his house.
You should make sure that Tom doesn\'t do that today.
